name: Logic Blocks - Brick Puzzle Lumber Version
name_original: Logic Blocks - Brick Puzzle Lumber Version
description:
Want something special? Do you like lumberjack style? Play this stylish game and train your logic and brain for FREE!

Logic Blocks - Brick Puzzle Lumber Version is a fun and free block puzzle game. Simple and easy to play - use your logic to move the different wood style blocks to fit in the field and collect points!

Compete with you FRIENDS and players all over the world - become the king of block puzzle!

Logic Blocks - Brick Puzzle Lumber Version is made specially for you!
